title:
Conditioning to avoid zero via a class of concave functions for
  one-dimensional diffusions
abstract:
For one-dimensional diffusions on the half-line, we study a specific type of
conditioning to avoid zero. We introduce martingales via a class of functions
that are concave with respect to the scale function and similar to the
densities of quasi-stationary distributions. The conditioning is formulated
through the exit times of the martingale, and its existence is shown. We
investigate its relation to the Yaglom limit and the absolute continuity
relations of the limit processes at time infinity.
